lead_paragraph: The authorities said Tareena Shakil, who went with her young son to Syria to become a “jihadi bride” but returned to Britain, was the first British woman convicted of joining the militants.

headline.main: British Woman Is Convicted of Joining ISIS

snippet: The authorities said Tareena Shakil, who went with her young son to Syria to become a “jihadi bride” but returned to Britain, was the first British woman convicted of joining the militants.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
